ovdesc.p: This application is used to specify the path to which the data files are to be copied. EXPORT.FILE.DETAILS may be set up only in the export area. When this record is verified, the data files are copied to the specified path with a prefix COMP.

desc.p: Should contain the ID of the corresponding record in COMPARE.FILE.DETAILS. Upto 45 characters are allowed.
Any ID with Alpha-Numeric values. Upto 20 characters are allowed.
Specifies the path to which the comparison data files should be copied to. Mandatory Field . Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Used to specify the files that are to be copied . Mandatory Field . Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Specifies the selection criteria .Upto 45 characters are allowed. Eg: @ID LIKE MBGLâ€¦
